description: This source file implements management functions for handling Objective Wrapper objects within the SLAP (Service Logic Aggregation Plane) framework, including attaching, detaching, removing, and cleaning object wrappers, with thread safety mechanisms. It interacts with external components such as GOA interface for object access management.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOwoUoacAttachObjWrapper(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hObjWrapper)
methods.description: Attaches a GOA object wrapper to the internal table, placing it into a hash-based bucket and associating it with its parent container.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOwoUoacDetachObjWrapper(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hObjWrapper)
methods.description: Detaches a GOA object wrapper from the internal table by removing it from its hash bucket and nullifying its container handle.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOwoUoacRemoveObjWrapper(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hObjWrapper)
methods.description: Removes a specified GOA object wrapper, invoking detach and then handling object access or deletion based on its mode.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOwoUoacCleanOwoTable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cleans up all object wrappers in the table, releasing associated resources and cleaning up object access via the GOA interface.
